text:
e="preserve">Sol Tolchinsky (January 2, 1929 – December 1, 2020) was a Canadian basketball player. He competed in the 1948 Summer Olympics. He was born in Montreal, Quebec. Tolchinsky was part of the Canadian basketball team, which finished ninth in the Olympic tournament.
Tochinsky died of COVID-19 in Montreal on December 1, 2020 at the age of 91.
